front.title: Extensions of for QoS Support in Transparent VLAN Services over MPLS

abstract.t: The document draft-lasserre-vkompella-ppvpn-vpls-00.txt describes a solution to support point-to-multipoint Transparent Virtual LAN (TVLAN) service over MPLS. This document describes two extensions to facilitate the provisioning and support of Quality of Service (QoS) in TVLAN over MPLS. First, we extend the use of the VCID field in the VC-FEC to identify a VPN endpoint. Second, we use one VC-label per source/destination VPN endpoint pair. In this document, we also identify a number of other mechanisms that increase the flexibility and ease of provisioning of QoS in the TVLAN service.
